style.color: function( featureObject, variableName, glyphObject, trackObject ) { var ftType = featureObject.get('type'); if (ftType == 'mRNA' || ftType == 'CDS') { return 'goldenrod'; } else { if (ftType.indexOf('RNA') == -1) { return '#cccccc'; } else { return '#ff4444' } } }
